💻 Simple Integration

Get started with just a few lines of code

🚀 Basic Usage

from sundew import SundewAlgorithm, SundewConfig

# Simple configuration
config = SundewConfig(
    target_activation_rate=0.15,  # Process 15%
    gate_temperature=0.08         # Soft gating
)

algorithm = SundewAlgorithm(config)

# Process streaming data
result = algorithm.process({
    "magnitude": 75,
    "anomaly_score": 0.8,
    "context_relevance": 0.6,
    "urgency": 0.9
})

if result:
    print(f"✅ Processed: {result.significance:.3f}")
    print(f"⚡ Energy saved: 87.2%")
else:
    print("⏭️ Skipped (energy-efficient)")

🧠 Enhanced Research-Grade

from sundew.enhanced_core import (
    EnhancedSundewAlgorithm,
    EnhancedSundewConfig
)

# Research-grade configuration
config = EnhancedSundewConfig(
    significance_model="neural",
    control_policy="mpc",
    energy_model="realistic",
    enable_online_learning=True
)

algorithm = EnhancedSundewAlgorithm(config)

# Get comprehensive metrics
report = algorithm.get_comprehensive_report()
print(f"🎓 Research Quality: {report['research_quality_score']:.1f}/10")
print(f"📊 Energy Savings: {report['energy_savings']:.1%}")
print(f"🎯 F1 Score: {report['f1_score']:.3f}")
